flipper.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a flat part on the body of some large sea animals such as seals, that they use for swimming
flipper.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a large flat rubber shoe that you wear to help you swim faster
flipper.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a US television programme from the 1960s in which a family become friends with a dolphin that they call ‘Flipper’
